attributes.action: allow prosecution action to be taken against MPs who fraudulently abused their allowance benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Tonys famous mantra in the 90s was about Education , i elect to chant PROSECUTION, PROSECUTION,PROSECUTION.
Now that this serious abuse of MPs allowances has been exposed , it is the duty of the Prime Minister to allow the investigation and lawful prosecution process to pursue those ministers who knowingly and wilfully claimed expenses fraudulently.

rejection.details: It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes and of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether to take the case to court and prosecute it. The Prime Minister would not have a choice about whether to allow it or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
